skill.name: vision
skill.description: Analyze images, screenshots, diagrams, and visual content - Use when you need to understand visual content like screenshots, architecture diagrams, UI mockups, or error screenshots.

skill.author: 0xSero

security_audit.summary: This is a pure YAML configuration skill with no executable code. All 19 static findings are false positives: the 'Hardcoded URL' and 'Hidden file access' flags refer to benign source URL metadata, and the 17 'Weak cryptographic algorithm' flags are misclassifications of ordinary descriptive text (words like 'text', 'describe', 'extract' were incorrectly flagged). The skill only configures vision capabilities for AI models with no network, filesystem, or command execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Users struggle to describe visual content accurately when debugging UI issues or documenting designs. This skill provides detailed analysis of screenshots, diagrams, and visual content with actionable observations.
actual_capabilities: Describe visible UI elements, text, errors, code, layout, and diagrams
Extract legible text accurately while preserving formatting
Identify broken, inconsistent, or suspicious visual elements
Analyze architecture diagrams and system flows
limitations: Cannot modify or edit images or visual content
Accuracy depends on image quality and clarity
Cannot access external image URLs or files without explicit sharing

use_cases.title: Debug UI issues
use_cases.description: Analyze error screenshots and UI bugs to understand visual problems quickly

use_cases.title: Review mockups
use_cases.description: Evaluate UI mockups and design diagrams for consistency and issues

use_cases.title: Document interfaces
use_cases.description: Create accurate descriptions of system interfaces and architecture diagrams

prompt_templates.title: Basic image analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this image and describe the visible UI elements, text, layout, and any errors or issues you notice.

prompt_templates.title: Text extraction
prompt_templates.prompt: Extract all legible text from this image accurately. Preserve formatting where relevant and note any unclear passages.

prompt_templates.title: Architecture review
prompt_templates.prompt: Examine this architecture diagram and describe the components, relationships, and data flow shown.

prompt_templates.title: Error investigation
prompt_templates.prompt: Look at this error screenshot and identify the error message, possible causes, and suggest next steps to resolve it.

output_examples.input: Analyze this screenshot of a failed deployment
output: The image shows a terminal window with a red error message: 'Build failed due to missing dependency: react-scripts@5.0.0'
The error occurs at line 23 of the build script
A suggestion to fix this is to run 'npm install react-scripts@5.0.0' or upgrade the package.json
The screenshot appears to be from a CI/CD pipeline interface

output_examples.input: Review this UI mockup and identify issues
output: The mockup shows a dashboard with a navigation sidebar and main content area
The header is misaligned with the sidebar by approximately 8 pixels
Button styles are inconsistent - primary buttons have different border radii
The color contrast on the error message may not meet WCAG AA standards

output_examples.input: What does this architecture diagram show?
output: The diagram shows a microservices architecture with three main services
API Gateway routes requests to Auth, User, and Payment services
Each service connects to its own database and uses message queue for async communication
External payments are processed through a third-party payment provider

best_practices: Share high-quality images for more accurate analysis
Specify what you are looking for in the image
Ask follow-up questions for clarification on complex visuals
anti_patterns: Expecting the skill to read text from heavily distorted images
Assuming the skill can access images not explicitly shared in the conversation

faq.question: What image formats are supported?
faq.answer: Most common formats including PNG, JPEG, GIF, and WebP are supported. Higher resolution images yield better analysis.

faq.question: How detailed is the text extraction?
faq.answer: The skill extracts legible text accurately while preserving formatting. Handwriting or highly stylized text may have lower accuracy.

faq.question: Can this integrate with image editing tools?
faq.answer: The skill analyzes images but does not modify them. Use image editing tools separately for modifications.

faq.question: Is my image data kept private?
faq.answer: Images are processed within your conversation context and are not stored beyond the session.

faq.question: Why does the analysis miss some details?
faq.answer: Accuracy depends on image quality, resolution, and clarity. Blurry, dark, or cluttered images may reduce detail detection.

faq.question: How is this different from other vision skills?
faq.answer: This skill provides focused, actionable observations tailored for technical content like error screens and diagrams.
